stimulusHtml: A block hangs at rest from a spring, stretching the spring to length L, as shown in the left figure. The block is then completely submerged in a tank of water and comes to rest, as shown in the right figure. It is observed that, with the block in the water, the spring’s length is less than L. Which of the following correctly indicates why the spring’s length decreases when the block is submerged?
choicesHtml: There is an additional force exerted on the block.
